name: 楊士萱
objective: This course will address both the theory and practice of video signal processing, mainly focused on video coding and transmission. The MPEG standards will be covered in depth.
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Entropy Coding
3. Transformation and Quantization
4. Predictive Coding and Motion Estimation
5. MPEG-1/2 Video Coding Standards
6. MPEG-4 Part-2 and H.264/AVC
7. High-Efficiency Video Coding (H.265/HEVC)
8. Multimedia File Format and Video Streaming
9. Scalable Video Coding, 3D Video, and Other Coding Extensions
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance 5% (extra)
2. Homework assignments 30%
3. Midterm exam 25%
4. Final exam 25%
5. Term project 20%
materials:
Textbook: 
No textbook. Lecture handouts will be given on the website.

References:
Listed in the handouts.
